#sidebar Documentation

=_Viewing provenance_=

This page describes some of the existing tools that can be used to view SQL and Neo4j databases generated by SPADE. *SQL Workbench/J* can be used to view relational (SQL) databases and *Neoclipse* can be used to view graph (Neo4j) databases. Use the submenu items on the left to learn more about SQL Workbench/J or Neoclipse.
